name: Shoot More Blocks
description:
Original Game Design by Ricky Henry and Jason Santuci.

Shoot more falling blocks than your opponent!  Each block damages the city below.  If all buildings are destroyed the game is over.  At the end of the game the player with the most points will have their score displayed.   Control your ship with left or right on the joystick.  The fire button will release a missile.  Each shot can destroy a brick for score.  Shooting the randomly located orb will clear some blocks.

Please do not make physical copies without permission.  My source of income is making new retro games.
